congVote.result: So (two-thirds not being in the affirmative) the motion was rejected.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Intelligence Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2018
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House failed to agree to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 3180, amended, to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2018 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, the Community Management Account, and the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 241 yeas to 163 nays, Roll No. 407; and

extension.searchTitle: DEPARTMENT OF VETERANS AFFAIRS BONUS TRANSPARENCY ACT; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 124

congVote.result: So (two-thirds not being in the affirmative) the motion was rejected.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Department of Veterans Affairs Bonus Transparency Act
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House failed to agree to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>S. 114, amended, to amend title 38, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to submit an annual report regarding performance awards and bonuses awarded to certain high-level employees of the Department of Veterans Affairs, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 219 yeas to 186 nays, Roll No. 408.
